MemoryInfobox.description: 'Considered ruthless, the much-feared General Lysander was not numb to the horror of war. His desire was to bring it to a quick end while ensuring that he would reap the benefits of victory.'

General_Description: '''Only Fools Want War''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was tasked by [[Lysander]] to recover 3 more seals from [[Athens|Athenian]] ''[[polemarch]]oi''.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Lysander:''' ''Time to strike again. Athenian command will be slow to retaliate. Ready to kill more of their fort commanders?''
(Accept – )
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll kill the commanders and clear the way for your troops.''
Lysander changed his tone.
*'''Lysander:''' ''Only fools want war. And so far it seems both sides are made of fools.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Good news, General?''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Athenian commanders have been dismissed for negligence because of my tactics!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Better unemployed than dead.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''You're proving a solid ally. There's no time to lose. We need to control the enemy forts..''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let me ask you something first...''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Waste of time!''
(If players asked "What do you think of Spartan generals?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You don't think much of Spartan leadership.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''When I rise, they'll bow.''
(Leave – )
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Chaire.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Why are you still here? Go kill the enemy command!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Consider it done.''

Kassandra returned to the general after finishing her task.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The fort commanders are dead. Here are the seals as proof.''
Lysander spread his arms and proudly said:
*'''Lysander:''' ''Excellent. Our ineffectual leaders will see my value.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm sure they will.''
Lysander leans a bit closer.
*'''Lysander:''' ''My spies tell me Athenians have gained ground. Infiltrate the forts and attack their command. Understand?''
(Accept – "I'll attack the commanders.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Yes. I'll do as you ask and attack the commanders.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They must be faltering by now.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Athenians fail because they fear risk.''
(Dialogue continues to start the next quest.)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Lysander collect 3 more ''polemarch'' seals. In return, she obtained Lysander's own personal [[Lysander's Boots|boots]] and another task to retrieve 3 more seals.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
